name: The black amulet of power transfer
data: It increases the users constitution unbelievably much.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'attack'.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'slash'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
It enables the user to give some of his physical energy to others.
